choices.A: Teams allow searches against the itsi_summary index.
choices.D: Teams allow restrictions to service content in UI views.
choices.C: Teams restrict searches against the itsi_notable_audit index.
choices.B: Teams restrict notable event alert actions.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
If needed, you can create new teams and use them to restrict access to some services
B. Teams restrict notable event alert actions.

Selected Answer: BCD
All except ping a host

Selected Answer: BCD
Correlation Searches -> "Other standard Splunk alert actions like RSS, script and email can also be executed."
Could someone please verify the accuracy of this answer

questions.question_text: Besides creating notable events, what are the default alert actions a correlation search can execute? (Choose all that apply.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Using Fields in Notable Displays -> "Add dynamic values to the notable event title, description, and drilldown fields using the %fieldname% syntax."

questions.question_text: Within a correlation search, dynamic field values can be specified with what syntax?

discussion.content: What is the name of the slides?

KPI Lane do not always require SPL. There is no such thing as Automatic Lane.
Deep Dive has three lanes:
KPI
Metric
Event

comments.content: whats is the name of the file? Thanks!

discussion.content: D. KPI lane - as SPL pre-populated from selecting service and KPI, whereas Metric and Event requires ad-hoc search to be written. Automatic, doesn't exist.

questions.question_text: Which deep dive swim lane type does not require writing SPL?
In maintenance mode, which features of KPIs still function?

choices.A: KPI searches will execute but will be buffered until the maintenance window is over.
choices.D: KPI calculations and threshold settings can be modified.
choices.C: New KPIs can be created, but existing KPIs are locked.
choices.B: KPI searches still run during maintenance mode, but results go to itsi_maintenance_summary index.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
The KPIs are ignored during a maintenance window.
Im not sure how to respond to that
